item.title: Manually Staking Cardano (ADA) to Maximize Passive Income
item.description: Introduction Would you like to make true 7% passive income off of your crypto? Sounds too good to be true right? Let’s talk. In this guide we will be going over to how to manually stake Cardano to maximize rewards. The term “staking” may seem scary to crypto newbies, but this is really just a misnomer. We are following the Proof-of-Stake protocol, not staking our money in terms of gambling it!
